name: PHILADELPHIA Farmhouse Chicken Dinner
author: Anonymous
summary: A homey and satisfying stove top chicken dish.
ingredients: ¼ cup KRAFT Calorie-Wise Zesty Italian Dressing
4 (6 ounce) bone-in chicken breast halves, skin removed
1 ½ cups instant white rice, uncooked
¼ cup PHILADELPHIA Light Cream Cheese Spread
directions: Mix flour and pepper in shallow dish
Add chicken; turn to evenly coat both sides with flour mixture
Heat dressing in large nonstick skillet on medium heat
Add chicken, meat-side down; cook 5 to 6 minutes or until golden brown
Turn chicken over; add carrots, onions and 1 cup of the broth
Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer 20 minutes or until carrots are tender and chicken is cooked through (170 degrees F)
Meanwhile, cook rice as directed on package
Use slotted spoon to remove chicken and vegetables from skillet; place over rice
Add cream cheese spread and remaining broth to skillet; increase heat to high
Cook until cheese is melted and sauce is well blended, stirring constantly
Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer 3 to 5 minutes or until sauce is slightly thickened, stirring occasionally
Spoon over chicken and vegetables; sprinkle with parsley
